message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $13,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What are your thoughts?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I'm interested, I'm looking to pay closer to $10,000 for the product. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I appreciate your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $10,000 is too low for me.  Would you consider $11,500?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  I'm still hoping to get closer to my initial offer of $10,000.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,750?
